litellm_env.description: LiteLLM provider environment, in the form <key>:<value>[;<key>:<value>...].  See LiteLLM documentation for supported variables.  Params must end with _API_KEY, and in the case of 'AZURE', _API_VERSION, or _API_BASE.  Leaving this empty uses Steamship's environment and thus Steamship billing.

max_retries.description: Maximum number of retries to make when generating.

default_role.description: The default role to use for a block that does not have a Tag of kind='role'

default_system_prompt.description: System prompt that will be prepended before every request
